quest.name: A Dirty Job
journal: Luckily for you, Guthjon is a man of his word.
objectives: Obtain the smoke bombs from the nearby shack.
Place the smoke bombs at the designated locations inside the mine.
Inspect the rubble and slay any knockers that appear to acquire glittering rocks.
Deliver the glittering rocks to Guthjon.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Perhaps our luck really is starting to turn around.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: To be honest, I wasn't sure you could pull it off.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: But you did, and I'm a man of my word. Come with me.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I hope you waited for the sundrops to wear off. They work wonders in the dark, but in the light of day they'll only bring you pain.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: <sigh> Every time I step out of those mines the sky seems to get brighter. I'd never leave them if the air weren't so stale...

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: But you're not come to hear my grievances. You're after leonine.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: First, I have to askâ”€you ever heard of rockworms?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Rockworms? I know them by another name, though I'm fairly certain the locals call them knockers.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: Aye, that they do. Whatever you want to call them, those little bastards may be the answer to your troubles.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: They can fit through cracks and crevices down where we could never hope to reach.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: And, on occasion, they come back with something valuable.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: They dig up leonine in the mines?

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: It's a rare occurrence, but yes. That said, it usually amounts to no more than a few flakes.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Well our only other option sounds tantamount to suicide. So how can we draw out these rockworms?

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: Over by that shack you'll find a bag full of smoke bombs. Set off a few in the mines and you'll flush them out in no time.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: Once they're out in the open, knock 'em senseless and check their backs.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: I should warn you this method of mining, if you can even call it that, is used as a last resort on account of what little they're like to bring back. You'll want to cover as much ground as you can if you hope to find anything of value.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: Assuming you do find something, bring it here and I'll have a look.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: We should split up if we're to cover more ground as he suggests. If you can cover these three areas on your map, I'll see to the parts between them.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: The smoke bombs are on top of the crates next to the shack just over yonder. You can't miss them.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: I see you've got the smoke bombs, but they'll do you no good out here.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: Light them in the mines and the rockworms will come scampering out before long.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The air in the mines grows thick with smoke. Nearby you hear the soft rumbling of stones.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence beneath the rubble!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I found my fair share of rocks. Hopefully there's leonine among them.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: There you are. Find anything promising?

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: Between the two of you I'd say you've got quite the haul.

dialogue.name: GUTHJON
dialogue.text: Best get comfortable, friends. It's going to take time for me to sift through all this.
